name: Synchro Stormraze
text:
This Skill can be used if your Extra Deck contains a WIND Synchro Monster.
1: Gain 1500 Life Points at the start of the Duel.
2: Can be used once per turn during your Main Phase. Choose 1 Synchro Monster on your field. The chosen monster gains 300 ATK until the end of the turn. It gains an additional 300 ATK until the end of the turn if there is a WIND monster on your field or in your Graveyard.
